data.title: One Sky Project - Planetarium Film Shorts
data.meta_description: One Sky Project is five short films exploring cultural and indigenous astronomy perspectives.
data.text:
Thursday NightLife: 6:30 pm, 7:30 pm, 8:30 pm, 9:30 pm

Capacity limited, reservations required

Explore five planetarium short films exploring cultural and indigenous astronomy perspectives from around the globe. Each film stands alone as a short story but in combination, they create a longer narrative â€“ organized around themes of "Finding Patterns" and developing tools, or as we say, "To Seek Far."

One Sky Project is an international collaboration focused on increasing understanding about cultural and indigenous astronomy, its historical and modern applications, and how our One Sky connects us all. To learn more visit www.oneskyproject.org.

PLANETARIUM PASSES
